HeightPages Property

CDXML Name:HeightPages
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_HeightPages
CDX Constant Value:0x0810
Data Size:INT16
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Page
First written/read in:ChemDraw 6.0
Required?No

Description:

The height of the document in pages.

This property is meaningful only for documents with a DrawingSpaceType of type Pages.

If this property is absent:

The document is assumed to be one page tall.
